channel.title: Why can't I decrypt the VERI token message in my Radix Wallet?
channel.description:
Some people have reported problems decrypting the VERI token message that is used to verify your wallet address by [Instapass](https://www.instapass.io/).
In the event this happens, please send an email to support@instapass.io to request another VERI token to be sent.
